content.prompt: Which of the following is an accurate description of the outcome of the Paris Commune?

choices.label: The Commune successfully defended Paris against the Prussian army.
The Commune successfully established a liberal democratic government in France.
The Commune was crushed by the French army.
The Commune promoted a reconciliation between French Catholics and socialists.

topic.text: 6.5: The Concert of Europe and European Conservatism

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
